title: Chronometric Age
description: The age of a specimen or related materials that is generated from a dating assay.

chronometricAgeRemarks.description: Notes or comments about the ChronometricAge.

chronometricAgeProtocol.description: A description of or reference to the methods used to determine the ChronometricAge.

chronometricAgeUncertaintyInYears.description: The temporal uncertainty of the earliestChronometricAge and latestChronometicAge in years.

earliestChronometricAgeReferenceSystem.description: The reference system associated with the earliestChronometricAge.

earliestChronometricAge.description: The maximum/earliest/oldest possible age of a specimen as determined by a dating method.

latestChronometricAgeReferenceSystem.description: The reference system associated with the latestChronometricAge.

latestChronometricAge.description: The minimum/latest/youngest possible age of an object in the collection as determined by a dating method.

verbatimChronometricAge.description: The verbatim age for the objects in the collection, whether reported by a dating assay, associated references, or legacy information.

hasIdentifier.description: This property refers to one or more related instances of the Identifier class.

hasReference.description: This property refers to one or more related instances of the Reference class.

hasMeasurementOrFact.description: This property refers to one or more related instances of the MeasurementOrFact class.
